ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all and everyone =) First off I wanted to thank Christina for creating this mailing-list (it happened to be the day after Gay Pride in NYC - Which was
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all and everyone =)

First off I wanted to thank Christina for creating this mailing-list (it
happened to be the day after Gay Pride in NYC - Which was awesome by the
way =P) !
Well , since everyone talked a little about themselves and their characters
I figured I should do the same =)
Here it goes :
My character name is Nystul , a level 29 Paladin who fights for justice in
the world of Norrath . He judges people individually , not by their race or
class (Exception being Dark-elf Necros and SK's since they have sworn
themselves to the path of evil and oppose directly as to what my character
stands for ... most of 'em at least =P ) . I haven't really thought about
RP'ing my character as a gay person , even though I think it could be fun
and interesting .

Alrighty , ooc :

I'm a 19 year old - almost 20 (July 10th , Wohooo !!!) gay guy living in
NYC . I don't have many gay friends (As strange as it might seem from
someone living in NYC , but it's true !!) and wish to make more . So I
guess this mailing list is a good start since all of us have a common
interest ... EQ =P
Anyway , that's all I have to say for now so take care all =)

- Nystul
